contextMenuSharePage.description: This message is shown when the context menu is displayed and no text is selected.
contextMenuSharePage.message: Share this web page to Facebook

contextMenuShareQuote.description: This message is shown when the context menu is displayed and text is selected.
contextMenuShareQuote.message: Share text as quote to Facebook

extensionName.description: The name of the chrome extension.

optionsPageUpdateSaved.description: This message is shown when the user updates any of their custom options in the options page.

selectionOverlayMessage.description: When text is selected on a webpage, an overlay will be shown. This text is displayed inside the overlay.
